item.title: 意大利网络受损后支付服务中断已恢复
item.description: 11 月 28 日和 29 日影响意大利支付服务的故障已经解决。【原文：An outage that affected payment services in Italy on Nov. 28 and 29 has been resolved.】

item.title: 疲于应付电子表格的预算编制者对漏洞百出的薄荷糖替代品表示不满
item.description: 金融科技的奇才们承诺，将通过时髦的应用程序改善人们的生活，这些应用程序能以比大银行更低的成本更好地管理人们的财务。【原文：The wizards of financial technology have pledged to improve people’s lives with snazzy apps that do a better job of managing their fiscal affairs, at a lower cost, than anything offered by big banks.】

item.title: 特朗普要求墨西哥阻止移民和毒品可能永远无法实现
item.description: 墨西哥需要数年时间（如果有的话）才能实现即将上任的美国总统唐纳德-特朗普为避免关税而提出的要求：阻止移民和毒品越境流动。【原文：It would take years, if ever, for Mexico to accomplish what incoming US President Donald Trump is demanding to avoid tariffs: stemming the flow of migrants and drugs over the border.】

item.title: 人工智能驱动的 "死亡时钟 "能更准确地预测你的死亡日期
item.description: 几个世纪以来，人类一直使用精算表来计算自己可能活多久。现在，人工智能正在承担这项任务--它的答案很可能会引起经济学家和理财经理的兴趣。【原文：For centuries, humans have used actuarial tables to figure out how long they’re likely to live. Now artificial intelligence is taking up the task – and its answers may well be of interest to economists and money managers.】

item.title: Adobe 称黑色星期五电子商务消费将达 108 亿美元
item.description: Adobe 公司周六发布的数据显示，美国消费者在 "黑色星期五 "的网上消费额可能达到创纪录的 108 亿美元。【原文：US consumers likely spent a record $10.8 billion online on Black Friday, according to data from Adobe Inc. on Saturday.】

item.title: CATL 联合创始人称投资 Northvolt 不是当务之急：FAS
item.description: 全球最大的电动汽车电池制造商当代安培科技有限公司（Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.全球最大的电动汽车电池制造商安培瑞斯（Amperex）科技有限公司的联合创始人潘建在接受《法兰克福汇报》采访时表示，该公司没有计划向陷入困境的瑞典同行 Northvolt AB 公司投资。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd., the world’s largest manufacturer of electric car batteries, has no plans to invest in stricken Swedish peer Northvolt AB, the Chinese company’s co-founder Pan Jian said in an interview with Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung.】

item.title: 瑞士央行施莱格尔称德国经济寒流正在侵袭瑞士
item.description: 瑞士国家银行行长马丁-施莱格尔（Martin Schlegel）说，瑞士正感受到来自其主要贸易伙伴德国的经济疲软。【原文：Switzerland is feeling economic weakness spilling over from its key trading partner Germany, Swiss National Bank President Martin Schlegel said.】

item.title: CPI 地产公司计划向零售投资者开放捷克投资组合
item.description: 房东 CPI 地产集团正计划通过开放式基金向散户投资者出售其捷克住宅投资组合的股份，以控制债务。【原文：Landlord CPI Property Group is planning to sell shares in its Czech residential portfolio through an open-ended fund to retail investors as it seeks to rein in debt.】

item.title: 特朗普的计划有可能使看涨的股市膨胀成泡沫
item.description: 特朗普新政府来势汹汹，其当务之急包括大规模驱逐无证移民和威胁引发全球贸易战。欧洲和中东的战事仍在继续。由于美国经济面临新一轮通胀风险，债券交易商正在缩减对降息的押注。【原文：The new Trump administration is coming in hot, with mass deportations of undocumented immigrants and threats of triggering a global trade war among its immediate priorities. Fighting continues in Europe and the Middle East. And bond traders are scaling back bets on lower interest rates as the US economy risks a fresh bout of inflation.】

item.title: 俄罗斯可能很快要在枪支和黄油之间做出选择
item.description: 俄罗斯被排斥在以美元为基础的全球金融体系之外，与西方国家的大部分贸易被切断，并陷入了普京愚蠢地以为会以闪电战的方式击败乌克兰的困境，但近年来俄罗斯的经济表现却十分出色。【原文：Shut out of the dollar-based global financial system, cut off from most trade with the West and bogged down in what Vladimir Putin foolishly thought would be a blitzkrieg-like defeat of Ukraine, Russia has nonetheless seen its economy outperform in recent years.】

item.title: 印度与意大利就蓝色经济和港口合作进行会谈
item.description: 意大利商业和制造部部长阿道夫-乌尔索（Adolfo Urso）表示，意大利正在与印度进行谈判，以加强在船舶和游艇制造行业的合作。【原文：Italy is in talks with India to ramp up cooperation in the ship and yacht building industries, Minister of Business and Made in Italy Adolfo Urso said.】

item.title: 中国房屋销售再次下滑，持续刺激效果缺失
item.description: 11 月份，中国住宅市场销售再次下滑，表明房地产行业要实现持续复苏仍有一段路要走。【原文：China’s residential market sales fell again in November, suggesting the property sector still has some ways to go before it can show a sustained recovery.】

item.title: BayWa 计划增资和出售资产作为改革的一部分
item.description: BayWa AG 计划发行股票并出售资产，以克服这家德国企业集团面临的资金紧张问题。【原文：BayWa AG plans to conduct a rights issue and sell off assets in a bid to overcome a cash squeeze debilitating the German conglomerate.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：粘滞的通胀支撑美联储的谨慎
item.description: 美联储首选的通胀指标在 10 月份加速上升，这有助于解释美国央行行长对降息采取更为谨慎的态度。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s preferred inflation measure accelerated in October, helping explain US central bankers’ more cautious approach to interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 印度经济增长令人震惊，分析师急忙下调预测
item.description: 周五公布的数据显示印度经济扩张急剧减速，经济学家因此下调了对印度经济增长的预期。【原文：Economists lowered their India growth forecast after data released Friday showed a sharp deceleration of the country’s economic expansion.】

item.title: 越南议会批准价值 670 亿美元的高速铁路项目
item.description: 越南将于 2027 年开始建设一个价值 670 亿美元的高速铁路网，将北部和南部省份连接起来，这也是越南政府为支持其经济增长雄心而规划的大型基础设施项目。【原文：Vietnam will start building a $67 billion high-speed rail network to connect its northern and southern provinces in 2027, as the government plans large infrastructure projects to support its economic growth ambitions.】

item.title: 新疆言论后，Fast Retailing 警惕抵制中国的行为
item.description: 据报道，优衣库服装连锁店的所有者 Fast Retailing Co.【原文：Fast Retailing Co., owner of the Uniqlo apparel chain, is closely monitoring to see if Chinese demand for its products is affected by Chairman Tadashi Yanai’s reported comment that the company isn’t using cotton from Xinjiang.】

item.title: 药物帮助瑞士抵御汇率波动带来的痛苦
item.description: 瑞士的政策制定者们在面对近十年来最强劲的法郎汇率时，可以感到欣慰的是：法郎对经济的挤压作用已今非昔比。【原文：For Swiss policymakers confronting the franc’s strongest levels in almost a decade, there’s comfort to be had: its squeeze on the economy isn’t quite what it used to be.】

item.title: 格鲁吉亚警方在抗议者重新集结后开始清理街道
item.description: 由于执政党宣布将推迟与欧盟的入盟谈判，格鲁吉亚警方和特种部队开始清理第比利斯主要大道上的抗议者和路障，冲突持续了第二个晚上。【原文：Georgian police and special forces began clearing protesters and barricades from the main avenue in Tbilisi after a second night of clashes, triggered by the ruling party announcement that it will delay talks with the European Union on membership.】

item.title: 秘鲁投票决定将非正式采矿许可证的有效期再延长六个月
item.description: 秘鲁国会周五晚些时候投票决定将一项有争议的许可延长六个月，该许可允许非正规矿山在秘鲁运营。【原文：Peru’s Congress voted late on Friday to extend for six months a controversial permit that allows informal mines to operate in the country.】

item.title: 中国工厂活动继续扩张，显示复苏迹象
item.description: 在广泛的一揽子刺激措施帮助扭转了连续数月的萎缩之后，中国的工厂活动在 11 月份继续扩张。【原文：China’s factory activity continued to expand in November, after a broad package of stimulus measures helped reverse months of contraction.】

item.title: 摩根大通放弃就马斯克推特和认股权证起诉特斯拉
item.description: 摩根大通同意撤销三年前对特斯拉公司提起的诉讼，该诉讼要求赔偿与股票权证交易相关的 1.62 亿美元。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. agreed to drop a lawsuit it filed against Tesla Inc. three years ago seeking $162 million tied to stock warrant transactions.】

item.title: 急于 "升值 "可能是亚洲股市抵御特朗普的最佳策略
item.description: 在日本的启发下，一种寻求提高股东回报、公司治理和市场估值的战略正像野火一样在亚洲蔓延。【原文：A Japan-inspired strategy of seeking to boost shareholder returns, corporate governance and market valuations is spreading like a wildfire across Asia.】

item.title: 穆迪将巴拿马债务展望降至负面，巴拿马债务濒临 "垃圾 "边缘
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将巴拿马的信用展望从稳定下调至负面，使其更接近于第二个垃圾级，因为这个中美洲国家面临着财政账户恶化的问题。【原文：Panama’s credit outlook was lowered to negative from stable by Moody’s Ratings, putting it closer to a second junk grade, as the Central American country faces deterioration in its fiscal accounts.】

item.title: 穆迪评级将匈牙利信用展望降至负面
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将匈牙利的债务前景从稳定下调至负面，理由是匈牙利的治理能力较弱，有可能失去欧盟的拨款和低成本贷款。【原文：Moody’s Ratings lowered the outlook of Hungary’s debt to negative from stable, citing weaker governance that risks losing grants and low-cost loans from the European Union.】

item.title: S&P坚持法国评级，为总理巴尼耶缓刑
item.description: 由于 S&P 全球评级公司重申了对法国债务的评估，法国总理米歇尔-巴尼耶（Michel Barnier）在通过预算和继续执政的斗争中赢得了一点缓和。【原文：French Prime Minister Michel Barnier won a minor reprieve in his battle to pass a budget and remain in power as S&P Global Ratings reiterated its assessment of the country’s debt.】

item.title: 社交媒体对孩子有害。如何应对？
item.description: 尽管有越来越多的证据表明社交媒体对青少年不利，但他们还是经常长时间使用社交媒体。健康专家列出的危害包括失眠、饮食失调和自杀。【原文：Young people often spend long hours on social media despite mounting evidence that it’s not good for them. Health experts list harms as varied as lost sleep, eating disorders and suicide.】

item.title: 关键利率上调，卢拉任命三位央行行长
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）周五提名了三位新的央行董事会成员，因为投资者要求央行更积极地提高利率，以冷却经济和抑制通货膨胀。【原文：Brazil President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva nominated three new central bank board members on Friday as investors pressure for more aggressive interest rate hikes to cool the economy and tame inflation.】

item.title: 斯托利品牌伏特加美国分公司申请破产保护
item.description: Stoli 品牌伏特加和肯塔基猫头鹰波旁酒的所有者 Stoli 集团的美国分公司已申请破产。【原文：The US arm of Stoli Group, the owner of Stoli brand vodka and Kentucky Owl bourbon, has filed bankruptcy.】

item.title: 墨西哥启动制止非法中国物品流动行动
item.description: 据墨西哥经济部称，墨西哥正计划在全国范围内开展 "清理 "行动，以打击主要从中国入境的非法商品流通。【原文：Mexico is planning to carry out a “cleaning” operation across the country to combat the flow of illegal merchandise entering the country mainly from China, according to the Economy Ministry.】
